# Egor Kotov's Homebrew Tap

This repository contains Homebrew formulas for various tools and applications developed by Egor Kotov.

## How to use

To add this tap to your Homebrew installation, run:

```bash
brew tap e-kotov/tap
```

## Available Formulas

| Formula | Description | Install Command |
|---------|-------------|-----------------|
| **[proxy-app-for-tailscale](https://github.com/e-kotov/tailscale-proxy-app)** | Independent Community Proxy for Tailscale | `brew install e-kotov/tap/proxy-app-for-tailscale` |
